rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CIV2282}
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-TRANS, MAE-WATER, MAEINFRA01, MAETRAN01, MAEWATR01} Otherwise true
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CIV2282}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CIV2281, CIV2282, ENG3205}

description: This unit examines issues in traffic management. The concepts of  efficient  and sustainable traffic systems are introduced along with the steps in the traffic impact analysis.The traffic engineering profession, road hierarchy, design of road and street networks, traffic management, traffic impact analysis, treatment of hazardous road locations, parking, design, planning for pedestrians and cyclists, public transport, environmental and energy impacts of traffic systems and,- intelligent transport systems are introduced and combined into a total system through transport planning, design and management.
